CustomField.description: Full Circle CRM Field. If used - this number is evaluated as part of the engagement threshold for a new campaign response. Negative values are supported to create responses that below the engagement threshold irrespective of the lead/contact engagement threshold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Full Circle CRM Field. If used - this number is evaluated as part of the engagement threshold for a new campaign response. Negative values are supported to create responses that below the engagement threshold irrespective of the lead/contact engagement th
CustomField.label: FCCRM Campaign Threshold
